content.modelAnsTranscript:
Student A: When do you feel bored?
Student B: I feel bored when it rains because my mother does not let me go out and play!
content.instructions:
• Click ► to listen to two examples.
  • Take turns with your partner and describe any one feeling.
  • Use words and phrases from the word cloud given below.
  • When you and your partner are ready, click 'record'
  • If you want to hear your recording, click on the ►.
  • If you are happy with your recording, click on 'Save File'.
